articles.title: GoDomainers Introduces AI-Powered Domain Recommendation Engine for Smarter, Brandable Name Discovery
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: GoDomainers introduced its AI-Powered Domain Recommendation Engine. This AI-driven tool is designed to help entrepreneurs and startups discover brandable domain names.

articles.title: Lazada affiliate program fuels next level e-commerce growth in PH
articles.summary: Lazada's LazAffiliate program is leveraging AI-driven tools to enhance its affiliate marketing efforts. This includes improvements to the dashboard with AI-driven recommendations and smart reporting tools. The LazAffiliate program will play a crucial role in promoting the 9.9 Mega Brands Sale, connecting shoppers with brands.

articles.title: 25 Game-Changing Products That'll Make Fall Cleaning And Organizing SO Much Easier
articles.author: May Ning
articles.summary: The article introduces several new products for cleaning and organizing, primarily available on Amazon Canada. These include the Scrub Mommy sponge, a TubShroom drain protector, various organizers, cleaning tools like electric scrubbers, and specialized solutions like baby item cleaner and stovetop cleaning kits. These items aim to solve everyday household challenges, from removing stubborn stains to optimizing storage spaces.

articles.title: 44 Products With Unbelievable Before And After Pics
articles.author: Jenae Sitzes
articles.summary: Several companies introduce new products or services: Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream promises smoother, firmer skin. Cosrx launches a lightweight snail mucin essence for hydration. Rain-X introduces a windshield treatment to repel rain and improve visibility. LilyAna Naturals offers an eye cream to reduce puffiness and fine lines. Burt's Bees launches a dander-reducing spray for cats. Bissell presents the Little Green machine for upholstery cleaning. Nuvo introduces a cabinet paint kit for easy kitchen renovations. Finishing Touch offers an electric razor for smooth shaves. The Pink Stuff introduces a new sponge set for tackling messes.

articles.title: A Legendary German Off-Roader Is Getting a Smaller and More Accessible Little Sibling
articles.author: Gray Van Dyke
articles.summary: Mercedes-Benz is expanding its G-Class lineup with the introduction of a new 'Mini G' model. The company also teased the revival of its G-Class Cabriolet. These announcements were part of Mercedes-Benz's 2025 IAA Mobility presentation.

articles.title: Godshall's Quality Meats Launches New Chicken Bacon
articles.author: Godshall's Quality Meats
articles.summary: Godshall's Quality Meats launched Chicken Bacon, a leaner alternative to traditional bacon. The product is crafted from premium whole muscle chicken and smoked in Godshall's smokehouse, catering to consumers seeking a better-for-you option.

articles.title: Local Officials Welcome Investment by Cannabis Brand in Middletown
articles.author: Oliver Mantyk
articles.summary: Jeeter, a pre-roll cannabis brand owned by DreamFields, is expanding into New York by investing millions in a production facility in Middletown. This expansion signifies the introduction of Jeeter's products to the New York market.

articles.title: You can get this bestselling cooling mattress topper on sale for 46% off at Amazon
articles.author: Amanda Edelman
articles.summary: Niagara Sleep Solution is launching their Ultra Soft Queen-Size Mattress Topper, available on Amazon. This mattress topper offers full-body support, cooling relief, and is made with lightweight viscose. It is currently on sale with a 46% discount for a limited time.

articles.title: Neusoft Shares Insights and Showcases Latest Products on Consumer Experience Innovations at IAA MOBILITY 2025
articles.author: Neusoft Corporation
articles.summary: Neusoft Corporation participated in IAA MOBILITY 2025 to showcase innovative automotive products, solutions, and services designed for consumers in the AI era. Dr. Angela Wang delivered a keynote speech sharing insights on consumer experience innovations and discussing the driving forces behind them to inspire global partners and clients.

articles.title: Neusoft Shares Insights and Showcases Latest Products on Consumer Experience Innovations at IAA MOBILITY 2025
articles.author: Neusoft Corporation
articles.summary: Neusoft Corporation participated in IAA MOBILITY 2025. Neusoft showcased innovative automotive products, solutions, and services. These offerings aim to transform the future of mobility and deliver exceptional consumer experiences in the AI era.

articles.title: Revolution Beauty's advent calendars are back after 28,000 people join waitlist
articles.summary: Revolution Beauty launched two new advent calendars. The launch aims to excite shoppers for the festive period. The launch occurred on September 9, 2025.

articles.title: Pink Palmetto Media, Florence Creative Marketing, Angled Marketing & Comfy Stone hosts 2025 Brand Intervention PR Event
articles.author: Jgreenlee Nopg.Com
articles.summary: Brand Intervention, a live event, is launching in New Orleans on October 1, 2025. This event offers real-time marketing and PR advice from experts to local businesses. Businesses can apply to participate for free visibility and guidance, while others can attend and network.

articles.title: Kandi Technologies Establishes New Subsidiary, Secures First Order with Indonesia's Largest Digital Ecosystem, GoTo  Sep. 9, 2025 20:00
articles.summary: Kandi Technologies Group, Inc., through its subsidiary Hangzhou Liaowangta Technology, is supplying three robots to GoTo Group for testing and innovation purposes. This marks Kandi's strategic expansion into the Southeast Asian market and underscores their commitment to advancing their embodied intelligence business.

articles.title: Kaltura To Unveil New AI-Powered Media Publishing Agent at IBC 2025  Sep. 9, 2025 20:00
articles.summary: Kaltura will unveil its new Media Publishing Agent at IBC 2025, designed to deliver hyper-personalized content experiences and automate publishing workflows. Additionally, Kaltura is launching its new Cloud TV Marketplace to enable customers to explore and activate integrations and AI-powered features.

articles.title: Talavera Solutions Launches the PromptShelf.ai Platform to Transform Professional Productivity by Facilitating AI Prompt Management
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Talavera Solutions launched PromptShelf.ai, a new platform for generative AI prompt creation, curation, and management. The platform aims to democratize access to AI and boost productivity by addressing the challenges of organizing and sharing AI prompts.

articles.title: Apple unveils iPhone 17, including first-ever iPhone Air
articles.author: ABC News
articles.summary: Apple introduced new versions of the Apple Watch and AirPods during a product event. These updates signify refinements and potential new features for the existing product lines.

articles.title: Is Apple's polishing cloth compatible with the new iPhones announced today?
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: Apple held an iPhone 17 event. New iPhones were announced at the event.

articles.title: This 'lightweight' car vacuum 'reaches every corner and keeps my car spotless' — and it's on sale for $37 on Amazon
articles.author: Andrea Karr
articles.summary: MIENOW has launched the Handheld Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, a lightweight and compact device designed for cleaning tight spaces. It features four modes including suction, blowing, inflation, and vacuum compression, along with a rechargeable battery and multiple attachments. The vacuum offers 15,000 Pa of suction power and includes an LED light for illuminating dark areas.

articles.title: AI sweeps consumer electronics, reshaping everyday life
articles.author: Source: Xinhua
articles.summary: At IFA Berlin 2025, global brands like Haier, Hisense, Bosch, and Siemens unveiled AI-powered appliances. NexLawn introduced a smart yard-care robot, while uCloudlink debuted PetPhone, a wearable for pets. These innovations showcase how AI is transforming daily life and pet care with intelligent and intuitive technologies.

articles.title: This Wheeled Laundry Basket Is A ‘Life Saver For My Back' On Laundry Day — And Secretly 35% Off
articles.author: Shopping Editor
articles.summary: A large-capacity laundry bin with sturdy wheels, a removable canvas bag, and a 170-liter capacity is available on Amazon. The laundry bin is currently priced under $50, marked down from nearly $70.

articles.title: Apple Debuts New iPhones At Awe Dropping Event Today
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Apple unveiled its latest lineup of iPhones and other products during the Apple Event 2025. The company also provided information on how to pre-order these new offerings.

articles.title: Taco Bell Debuts 2 'Cool' New Drinks That Fans Know Will Be 'Yummy'
articles.author: Marisa Losciale
articles.summary: Taco Bell is launching two new frozen beverages: the Orange Vanilla Cream Soda Freeze and the Vanilla Cream Soda Freeze. The Orange Vanilla Cream Soda Freeze is described as a blend of sweet vanilla frozen slushy with vanilla crème and tangy orange flavor, while the Vanilla Cream Soda Freeze features vanilla slushy with vanilla crème. These drinks launched nationwide on September 9th for a limited time with prices starting at $3.69.

articles.title: Tootsie Pop's ‘How Many Licks' commercial gets a makeover after 55 years
articles.author: NBC Bay Area
articles.summary: Tootsie Roll released a refreshed version of its 1970s "How Many Licks" commercial on Monday. The updated commercial features new animation and voiceovers while maintaining the original art style.

articles.title: New AI-powered innovations on Coursera: Role Play for Authors, Course Builder for Partners, Skill Tracks for Enterprise, and more (Coursera Inc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Coursera announced new and expanded AI-powered product capabilities at its annual conference, Coursera Connect. These new features are designed to improve the experience for learners, partners, and customers.

articles.title: YGS announces rebrand of licensing division
articles.author: Ed Gruver
articles.summary: YGS Group has rebranded its licensing division to YGS Content Licensing, emphasizing content licensing as its core focus. This rebrand is accompanied by investment in AI technology to enhance lead generation and strategic partnerships with content providers and brands. The aim is to provide revenue-generating solutions and expand strategic licensing services.

articles.title: Girl Scouts reveal new cookie flavor to be sold next year
articles.summary: Girl Scouts are introducing a new cookie flavor that will be available for sale next year.

articles.title: Anthony Hayes Unveils 'Unshackled' DigitalATM System – Revolutionary AI Platform Transforms Ideas Into Profitable Digital ...
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Anthony Hayes introduces "Unshackled", a new AI-powered system. This system enables users to create and launch profitable digital tools quickly.

articles.title: This bestselling steamer has 125,000+ reviews on Amazon and is almost 50% off right now
articles.author: Cory Fernandez
articles.summary: HiLife's travel steamer, a bestseller with over 125,000 reviews on Amazon, is currently on sale at nearly 50% off. The steamer is lightweight and compact, suitable for travel, and safe for use on various fabrics. It features an 8-ounce capacity, a 9-foot power cord, a 2-minute heat-up time, and a 15-minute run-time.

articles.title: Don't spend $400 on Le Creuset pot, get this Crofton pot from Aldi in New Jersey instead
articles.author: Damon C. Williams
articles.summary: Aldi is selling its Crofton-labeled cast iron dutch oven for $29.99 as a Le Creuset alternative. The six-quart dutch oven features a porcelain enamel coating. Aldi is having a run on its line of Crofton-branded kitchen appliances this week.

articles.title: Meet Veazy: Storz and Bickel's cutest (and most affordable) weed vape yet
articles.author: Rachelle Gordon
articles.summary: Storz and Bickel introduced the Veazy, their most accessible and compact dry herb vaporizer to date. The Veazy features a dual conduction and convection oven, USB-C charging, and Bluetooth connectivity for temperature control via a web app. Priced at $249, the Veazy is available in four colors and offers a smooth draw, making it an appealing entry point to the Storz and Bickel brand.

articles.title: I tried the new £11 gourmet burger at Burger King - there was one big problem
articles.author: Dianne Bourne
articles.summary: Burger King has launched a new "premium" Wagyu burger in the UK, priced at £11. The burger features 100% British Wagyu beef and is available for a limited time nationwide in Burger King restaurants and via Deliveroo exclusively until September 22, then on other delivery platforms from September 23.

articles.title: AI projects showcase China-ASEAN cross-border e-commerce potential
articles.summary: The 2025 China-ASEAN competition showcased AI innovations in cross-border e-commerce. The exhibition featured sections covering talent development, customer acquisition using AI, ASEAN language applications in cross-border trade utilizing AI, AI-driven supply chain optimization, and AI for tariff calculation. A smart livestreaming device was also tested, indicating the introduction of new AI-based e-commerce tools and services.

articles.title: Claude can create PDFs, slides, and spreadsheets for you now in chat
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Anthropic introduced a new feature that eliminates the need for copy and pasting.

articles.title: LG Demo's AI-Powered Living at IFA 2025
articles.summary: LG Electronics will introduce new AI-powered home appliances at IFA 2025, including refrigerators with AI-powered compressors and Zero Clearance Hinges, AI-enabled washing machines and dryers, and a range of new vacuum cleaners. These products are designed to enhance user experience, save energy, and better fit into European homes.

articles.title: Digital-first customer experience is transforming customer service
articles.author: Global Data Technology
articles.summary: Cisco, RingCentral, and Zoom are enhancing their contact center offerings with GenAI and agentic AI. These updates aim to improve customer satisfaction by empowering agents and enabling supervisors with better tools, ultimately leading to more efficient contact center operations and richer digital-first customer experiences.

articles.title: Chinese smart devices accelerate global push with AI ecosystem edge
articles.summary: Xiaomi is expanding its product line to include smart devices and plans to export electric vehicles by 2027 to build a human-vehicle-home ecosystem. iFlytek experienced a surge in overseas AI hardware sales, driven by its AI models and integrated hardware-software products. Lenovo holds a significant share in the AI PC market, highlighting the growth of Chinese brands in AI-powered consumer electronics.

articles.title: ABC7 News at 7am - September 9, 2025
articles.summary: Apple is expected to unveil a new iPhone. The new iPhone's features and potential cost are anticipated to be revealed.

articles.title: ChatGPT Prompt Generator Produced High-Converting Copy — CTR Up 61% In A Week
articles.author: Advertiser
articles.summary: Chatronix, a new platform, has been introduced which integrates multiple AI models including ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Grok, Perplexity, DeepSeek to improve ad copy generation. Chatronix offers features such as Turbo Mode for refined ad copy and a Prompt Library for efficient prompt management, providing a multi-model shortcut.

articles.title: Amazon's cordless vacuum is on sale for as low as $94
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Lubluelu Cordless Vacuum Cleaner at a discounted price. This cordless stick vacuum features a 235W brushless motor, up to 25,000Pa suction power, and a high-capacity removable battery delivering up to 50 minutes of runtime, covering up to 2,500 square feet per charge. The vacuum also includes an upgraded V-shaped anti-tangle roller brush, flexible brush head, LED light, and a built-in LED touch display.

articles.title: 36 TikTok-Approved Beauty Products That'll Convince You That App Isn't A Total Waste Of Time
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Maybelline launched Lifter Glaze Oil Balm and Dark Circles Treatment Concealer. Philips Norelco introduced OneBlade Intimate razor. Laneige launched Neo Blurring Powder. Good Molecules introduced Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel. Color Wow launched One-Minute Transformation cream. Eos launched Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere body lotion. CND Essentials introduced nail and cuticle oil. Londontown launched "Nail Veil" Protectant. Saltair launched body oil. Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash. Gold Bond launched firming neck and chest cream. Kahi launched Wrinkle Bounce Hydrating Multi-Balm. Touchland launched Power Mist hydrating hand sanitizer. Mise En Scéne launched a hair serum. Tonymoly launched blackhead remover. Skala launched Mais Cacho Hair 2-in-1 Conditioning Treatment. Kiss launched PowerFlex Maximum Speed Nail Glue. Elizavecca launched Hair Treatment. Clean Skin Club launched Clean Towels. Thank Me Later launched Eyeshadow Base. Bio-Collagen launched Real Deep sheet mask. K-18 launched a leave-in mask. E.l.f launched tubing mascara. Mane Club launched One Hit Wonder, a 10-in-1 spray. Catrice launched "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. I Dew Care launched dry shampoo powder.

articles.title: LTK Introduces Brand Profiles to Unlock Direct Consumer Engagement in the LTK app; Offers Brands Free Access to LTK Brand Platform
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: LTK launched Brand Profiles in its consumer app and provided free access to its brand platform. These updates aim to transform brand connections with consumers and scale creator partnerships on the LTK platform.

articles.title: Eyewitness News at 10am - September 9, 2025
articles.summary: Apple is expected to unveil a new iPhone. The unveiling event will likely provide information about the product's cost. This event represents the introduction of a new product.

articles.title: I put the Panda mattress topper to the test and loved it
articles.author: Zoë Phillimore
articles.summary: Panda has launched a bamboo mattress topper featuring hydro foam, designed to regulate temperature and provide comfort. The topper comes in various sizes with a 10-year guarantee and a 30-night trial. Tester highlights include improved support, reduced aches and pains, and better temperature regulation compared to older memory foam options.

articles.title: Claude New Feature Update: Anthropic AI Working on New Capability To Let Users Generate PowerPoints, Excel Sheets, PDFs and More Files
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Anthropic AI is developing a new feature for its Claude platform, enabling users to generate complete documents such as PowerPoint presentations, Excel sheets, and PDFs. This 'Create Files' option is expected to be available soon for all Claude users.

articles.title: Forget iPhone 17 Air - this ridiculously thin Android lasts all day and is only $200
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Tecno has launched the Pova Slim smartphone. The phone's design is noteworthy.

articles.title: About to buy a new iPhone? Experts say waiting could be the smartest move
articles.author: Advaita Suresh
articles.summary: Apple is anticipated to launch the iPhone 17 series at its fall event. Preorders are expected to begin around Sept. 12, with shipping the following week. The new iPhone 17 series may feature a redesigned camera, new colors, and a slimmer model, along with iOS 26.

articles.title: How the TCL NXTPAPER 60 Ultra redefines smartphone display comfort
articles.author: Nicholas Sutrich
articles.summary: TCL has introduced NXTPAPER 4.0 display technology, featured in the TCL NXTPAPER 60 Ultra smartphone. This custom LCD technology prioritizes eye comfort with features like a matte anti-glare layer, flicker-free operation, and blue light filter. The NXTPAPER 60 Ultra display offers multiple eye care modes, excellent color reproduction, and improved black levels, marking TCL as a new quality contender in IPS displays.

articles.title: £10 off when you spend £20 on No7 at Boots with this great offer inside your paper
articles.author: Partner Stories
articles.summary: No7 is launching new products in its Future Renew range, including the Damage Reversal Night Serum, Cleanser, and Night Cream, available at Boots. These products are designed to reverse visible signs of skin damage. Customers can save £10 when they spend £20 on any No7 products.

articles.title: Big Ideas Start Young: NFTE Opens 2025 World Series of Innovation to Innovators Ages 5–24
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: The Network for Teaching Entrepreneurship (NFTE) launched the 2025 World Series of Innovation (WSI), a global competition for young people ages 5-24 to design solutions for challenges aligned with the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). Sponsors for the competition include Aflatoun, CBT Technology, Comerica Bank, Ernst & Young LLP (EY US), EverBank, N.A., MetLife Foundation, and PayPal.

articles.title: Big Ideas Start Young: NFTE Opens 2025 World Series of Innovation to Innovators Ages 5–24
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: The Network for Teaching Entrepreneurship (NFTE) launched the 2025 World Series of Innovation (WSI). This annual global competition invites young people to develop solutions to global challenges. Sponsors include Aflatoun, CBT Technology, Comerica Bank, Ernst & Young LLP (EY US), EverBank, N.A., MetLife Foundation, and PayPal.

articles.title: Your Car Might Be an Xbox Soon Thanks to New Xbox-LG Partnership
articles.author: Tech Raptor
articles.summary: Xbox and LG have partnered to bring the Xbox Cloud Gaming app to cars. This partnership enables cars to support the gaming service, effectively turning them into Xbox-enabled entertainment systems.

articles.title: Girl Scouts announce new cookie
articles.summary: Girl Scouts of the USA will introduce a new cookie to their product lineup when cookie sales begin.

articles.title: Discover Revolutionary Design: Experience the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip7's Innovative Features Inside Out
articles.summary: Samsung is introducing the Galaxy Z Flip7, a foldable smartphone featuring a redesigned hinge for improved durability and a larger, more functional Flex Window. The device also boasts an upgraded camera system with enhanced sensors and FlexCam mode, powered by the latest Snapdragon processor for increased performance and efficiency.

articles.title: Exciting Offers: Up to 50% Off on Whirlpool, Samsung, and LG Washing Machines
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Bajaj Finserv is offering attractive deals on washing machines from brands like Whirlpool, Samsung, and LG, including savings up to Rs. 10,000 and flexible EMI options. Several models are highlighted with specific features and EMI starting prices, aiming to make premium washing machines more affordable and accessible through Bajaj Finserv's network.

articles.title: Young's looks to reel in shoppers with supersized Chip Shop frozen pollock
articles.author: Helen Gilbert
articles.summary: Young's Seafood has introduced the Jumbo Fish Special, a giant-sized battered pollock, to its Chip Shop range. This launch follows the success of their Jumbo Cod Special and aims to provide consumers with a value-packed takeaway experience at home amidst tightening budgets. The product is available at Tesco and other major retailers.

articles.title: Meet Fellou: The Latest Agentic AI
articles.author: Shiraz Aslam
articles.summary: Fellou, the world's first agentic AI browser, has been launched. It automates workflows, manages tasks, and coordinates across platforms, enabling users to instruct the browser to execute tasks autonomously, thus redefining the user's relationship with the internet.

articles.title: This Platform Uses AI to Speed Up Your Photo Book Creation
articles.author: Carly Quellman
articles.summary: Popsa, founded by Liam Houghton and Tom Cohen, launched a mobile-friendly platform in 2016 that uses AI to help turn photos into keepsakes. In 2018, the company launched the Android version of its app. Popsa's proprietary AI reduces the time needed to create photo books, turning a 2-hour design into a 0.4-second generation.

articles.title: B&M's 86p buy stops your clothes smelling all musty after drying them indoors
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: B&M is offering the Air Scents Hanging Dehumidifier, priced at 86p, designed to eliminate musty odors and lower the chance of mould development in homes. The product absorbs moisture from the air, protecting garments from damage and keeping them fresh.

articles.title: Ralph Lauren's new AI app is paving the way for a shopping revolution
articles.author: Elizabeth Segran
articles.summary: Ralph Lauren has launched "Ask Ralph," an AI stylist in its mobile app, developed in partnership with Microsoft. This new feature offers personalized styling recommendations based on user preferences and the brand's aesthetic, aiming to replicate the experience of consulting with a Ralph Lauren stylist. The app curates complete looks from the current Ralph Lauren collection, providing a convenient and tailored shopping experience.

articles.title: Glossier Cloud Paint Plush Blush Editor Review
articles.author: Lauren Balsamo
articles.summary: Glossier has launched Cloud Paint Plush Blush, a powder version of their original Cloud Paint. This new blush offers long-lasting wear and a blurring effect, with a texture that blends like a cream. While not as groundbreaking as the original, it is praised for its buildability and ability to create a soft, velvety look.

articles.title: Cointreau Launches First-Ever Ready-To-Serve Range – Introducing Cointreau Citrus Spritz
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Cointreau is launching its first Ready-to-Serve product, Cointreau Citrus Spritz, which is a line of sparkling cocktails. This new product aims to tap into the growing Ready-to-Serve market.

articles.title: Google Temporarily Removes a New Pixel 10 Feature
articles.author: Cory Gunther
articles.summary: Google launched a new AI-powered feature called "Daily Hub" on its Pixel 10 series, designed to provide users with personalized summaries and suggestions. However, due to negative feedback and performance issues, Google has temporarily paused the public preview of Daily Hub to enhance its performance and refine the personalized experience.

articles.title: Dry wet washing in less than 10 minutes with £7 Amazon gadget – and you can take it on holiday too
articles.author: Allan Glen
articles.summary: Amazon is stocking a new turbo washing machine that cleans clothes in under 10 minutes. This compact, USB-powered gadget is designed for small items like socks and underwear and is suitable for travel and confined spaces. Customers praise its ease of use and effectiveness.

articles.title: ABC7 News at 5am - September 9, 2025
articles.summary: Apple is expected to unveil a new iPhone. Speculations are ongoing regarding the price point of this new product.

articles.title: Genesys Orchestrators Debuts to Drive CX Innovation and Impact by Uniting Education, Support and Resources Into One Powerful Community
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Genesys launched the Genesys Orchestrators™ program. This program will empower customer experience professionals with knowledge, resources, community, and credentials. The goal is to accelerate the future of CX through AI.

articles.title: Action News at 5am - September 9, 2025
articles.summary: Apple is expected to unveil a new iPhone. The unveiling is generating speculation about potential price increases.

articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra impresses with its bold design
articles.author: Steve Vegvari
articles.summary: Samsung has released the Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra. The author has recently tested the device and believes it has all the desired features for a tablet, despite its large size.

articles.title: One Of iMessage's Best Features Is Finally Rolling Out For Android Users
articles.author: Nadeem Sarwar
articles.summary: Google is testing and implementing an 'unsend' or message deletion feature for its Messages platform. This feature, similar to WhatsApp, allows users to delete messages on both their end and the recipient's. The availability is currently limited to the mobile app with RCS protocol chats enabled and a time window of 15-40 minutes for message deletion.

articles.title: Bell launches Bell Cyber, building on AI and tech services umbrella
articles.author: Sammy Hudes
articles.summary: Bell Canada launched Bell Cyber, a new AI-powered cybersecurity solutions brand, unifying all of its cybersecurity capabilities. Bell Cyber offers next-generation security-as-a-service by combining internal security platforms and telco infrastructure with real-time threat detection. The technology uses AI and automation to proactively detect and contain threats quickly.

articles.title: Bell launches Bell Cyber, building on AI and tech services umbrella
articles.author: Sammy Hudes
articles.summary: Bell Canada is launching Bell Cyber, a new brand offering AI-powered cybersecurity solutions. The announcement was made at Bell's inaugural Cybersecurity Summit in Toronto.

articles.title: 56 Must-Have Products Renters Love
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: Several new household cleaning products and tools are introduced, including a no-scrub shower cleaner, toilet cleaning solutions (stamp and tablets), and pet hair removers.  Additionally, items such as grout pens, mold removers, and drain solutions, including Green Gobbler products, offer cleaning and maintenance solutions for homes and apartments.

articles.title: Bills STUN Ravens in EPIC Comeback, Biggest Takeaways from a Phenomenal Week 1
articles.summary: KENS 5 streams can be accessed on phones using the KENS 5 app.

articles.title: Shake Shack Finally Adds This Most-Requested Side Item to Menus Nationwide
articles.author: Cristine Struble
articles.summary: Shake Shack has launched onion rings as a new side dish, available on the app today and in restaurants on September 12, priced at $5.49. Additionally, Shake Shack introduced three new burgers inspired by French Onion Soup: the French Onion Soup Burger ($10.99), the French Onion 'Shroom Burger ($11.29), and the French Onion Shack Stack ($14.29).

articles.title: Syntax Launches GenAI Starter Pack for Safe, Rapid Generative AI Adoption
articles.author: Syntax Systems
articles.summary: Syntax Systems launched the Syntax GenAI Starter Pack, a pre-configured solution designed for rapid Generative AI adoption. The Starter Pack offers accelerated deployment, built-in governance, flexible technology choices, and risk-free exploration for businesses aiming to leverage GenAI technologies quickly and securely. BH SENS utilized the Starter Pack workshop to integrate AI into their TPMS operations.

articles.title: Little Debbie Making Major Change to Some of Their Classics
articles.author: Evan Paul
articles.summary: Little Debbie is introducing new, convenient sizes of its snack products, offering consumers a revised take on familiar favorites.

articles.title: The Next £19 sweatshirt on sale that gets 'surprising compliments'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Next has reduced the price of its Burgundy Red Hamptons New York Sporty City Graphic Zip Neck Collar 100% Cotton Sweatshirt from £38 to £19. The sweatshirt features a 'Hamptons 97 New York' graphic and is made from 100% cotton with a half-zip fastening.

articles.title: Gordon Ramsay shares his top tips for the perfect burger
articles.author: Lauren Taylor
articles.summary: Burger King UK has launched a new £11 wagyu beef burger. The burger, endorsed by Gordon Ramsay, features British wagyu beef, caramelised onion mayo, rocket, and a trio of onions and is available for a limited time starting September 9.

articles.title: Matter Helps Companies Lead in Generative AI Era with New AI Brand Discovery Service
articles.author: Matter Communications
articles.summary: Matter, an agency, launched a new Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) service. This service is designed to help companies improve their visibility in AI search results. The offering positions Matter as one of the first agencies providing tailored GEO support.

articles.title: Nebius jumps after $17.4-billion AI computing deal with Microsoft
articles.author: Kritika Lamba
articles.summary: Nebius, an AI cloud service provider, has entered into an agreement with Microsoft to supply dedicated GPU infrastructure from their new data center in Vineland, New Jersey. This partnership will allow Nebius to expand their AI cloud growth and provide Microsoft with crucial AI cloud infrastructure to address growing client needs. Nebius's core business involves offering full-stack AI cloud services built on Nvidia computing.

articles.title: SRTI Park launches new brand
articles.author: Sharjah 24
articles.summary: SRTI Park has launched a new brand to unify its brand language and strengthen its presence locally and regionally. The new brand establishes a unified operational framework connecting research with application and entrepreneurship through enabling access to infrastructure and expertise, transforming outputs into prototypes and products, and accelerating market entry.

articles.title: Helport AI Launches HelportGo App
articles.author: Helport AI
articles.summary: Helport AI has launched HelportGo, a flagship mobile application aimed at boosting productivity for professionals on the move. This application extends Helport AI's AI capabilities to individual users, offering immediate call assistance designed to convert conversations into structured business intelligence.

articles.title: ‘Speed, not ideas, is the hardest challenge': James Dyson on innovation, AI
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Dyson unveiled its next generation of air purifiers, vacuum cleaners, and fans at its flagship store in Germany. Sir James Dyson stated the company focuses on creating smaller, lighter, and more efficient technology.

articles.title: Samsung Launches the All-New Galaxy A07: Built for Every Challenge
articles.author: Content Supplied
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics launched the Galaxy A07 on September 1, 2025. The Galaxy A07 features a durable design, a 6.7' 90Hz display, 128GB of internal memory with 4+4GB RAM and long-lasting battery, and IP54-rated splash and dust resistance. The Samsung Galaxy A07 is available at Samsung retail and online stores, Samsung Shop App, retailers and network operators.

articles.title: Automation and AI Unlock New Value Across Global Service Industries
articles.author: CNW Group
articles.summary: Nightfood Holdings (NGTF) is transitioning into a robotics-first company, recently acquiring a Holiday Inn in Victorville, CA for $31 million. This property will function as a live RaaS innovation hub, showcasing the deployment of robotics and AI in hospitality, including Skytech's Laundry Helper robot. Nightfood plans to license its robotic systems to other hotels, generating recurring revenue.

articles.title: Action News at 4:30am - September 9, 2025
articles.summary: Apple is expected to unveil a new iPhone. Speculation surrounds the potential cost and features of the upcoming product.

articles.title: DRIVEN: Porsche 911 GTS has been boosted in all the right places
articles.author: Jason Woosey
articles.summary: Porsche has launched the 2025 Porsche 911 GTS, featuring a new T-Hybrid system that pairs a 3.6-litre flat-six turbopetrol engine with an electric motor, delivering 398kW and 610Nm. The new model includes visual and cabin enhancements, along with performance upgrades such as rear-axle steering and reworked suspension.

articles.title: Walmart Announces Stores in South Africa
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Walmart plans to launch its first branded stores in South Africa later this year, offering a wide range of merchandise including groceries, household essentials, apparel, and technology, along with locally sourced products. The company will share further details about store locations, hiring, and community initiatives in the coming months.

articles.title: Walmart Announces Stores in South Africa
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Walmart plans to open its first branded stores in South Africa later this year, offering a wide range of merchandise including fresh groceries, household essentials, apparel, and technology, along with locally sourced products.  These stores, currently under development, will also offer digital capabilities and are expected to open with official dates announced in October.

articles.title: Walmart Announces Stores in South Africa
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Walmart plans to launch its first branded stores in South Africa later this year, offering a wide range of merchandise including fresh groceries, household essentials, apparel, and technology. The new stores will also offer locally sourced products and aim to bring Walmart's Every Day Low Prices and global standards to the South African market.

articles.title: Kandi Technologies Establishes New Subsidiary, Secures First Order with Indonesia's Largest ...
articles.author: Kandi Technologies Group
articles.summary: Kandi Technologies' subsidiary, Hangzhou Liaowangta Technology, will supply three robots to GoTo Group for testing and innovation. This first order marks Kandi's expansion into the Southeast Asian market and the introduction of its embodied intelligence business.

articles.title: For businesses facing rising ad costs, SEO is a sustainable path
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: Blazly, an AI-powered SEO tool, helps businesses create content strategies, analyze competitors, and optimize content for SEO. It functions as an in-house content team, checking for plagiarism and ensuring SEO standards are met before content goes live, offering a potential solution for businesses to improve organic visibility and reduce overhead.

articles.title: Best Beauty Products of 2025 in PEOPLE's Beauty Awards
articles.author: Jackie Fields
articles.summary: PEOPLE's Beauty Awards for 2025 features 100 of the best new beauty products under $200, across skin care, hair care, and makeup. Editors and testers spent months evaluating the latest product launches to identify top performers in categories like serums, moisturizers, and hair styling products.

articles.title: Dyson V8 Absolute stick vacuum is on sale for its cheapest price yet
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Dyson is offering the V8 Absolute cordless vacuum for a discounted price of $329, reduced from its original price of $589. This cordless vacuum provides up to 40 minutes of runtime and has two specialized cleaner heads, one for hard floors and another with de-tangling technology for carpets. The filtration system captures 99.99% of microscopic particles.

articles.title: Google pulls the Pixel 10's Daily Hub to ‘enhance its performance'
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Google has paused the public preview of Daily Hub, an AI feature on the Pixel 10 line, shortly after the phone's launch. The company is working to enhance the feature's performance and refine its personalized experience, with plans to reintroduce an improved version in the future.

articles.title: I spent two weeks with the OnePlus Nord 5, and I can't decide whether it's an upgrade or a downgrade
articles.author: Tom Bedford
articles.summary: OnePlus launched the OnePlus Nord 5 in early July 2025, featuring a 6.83-inch display, Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset, and a 50MP main camera. The phone is available in 8GB/256GB and 12GB/512GB configurations, priced at £399 / AU$799 and £499 / AU$899 respectively, and runs on Android 15 with OxygenOS 15.

articles.title: Gordon Ramsay shares his top tips for the perfect burger
articles.author: Lauren Taylor
articles.summary: Burger King UK has launched a new wagyu beef burger endorsed by celebrity chef Gordon Ramsay. The burger features British wagyu beef, caramelised onion mayo, rocket, and a trio of onions, and it became available on September 9th for a limited time. Ramsay also shared his tips for cooking the perfect burger.

articles.title: Aldi vs Lidl 99p curry sauce taste test winner is my new favourite autumn meal
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Aldi and Lidl offer 99p Korma curry sauces. A taste test was conducted, comparing Aldi's sauce, which is more orange and slightly more liquid, to Lidl's sauce. The reviewer found Lidl's sauce, with its pronounced coconut flavor and thicker consistency, to be superior and a new favorite.

articles.title: Reviewers Are Singing The Praises Of These 36 Genius Kitchen Products
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The article introduces various kitchen gadgets designed to simplify cooking and food preparation. These include items like a lasagna trio pan for preparing meals with dietary restrictions, a rapid egg cooker, a space-saving grater and slicer set, a pancake batter mixer, meat shredder claws, refrigerator drip catchers, a cookware set with detachable handles, and a plant-based cooking oil solidifier. The gadgets aim to reduce cooking time, save space, and minimize cleanup, offering practical solutions for everyday kitchen tasks.

articles.title: Eyewitness News at 6am - September 9, 2025
articles.summary: Apple is expected to unveil the new iPhone. The event will reveal details about its potential price increase.

articles.title: McDonald's fans face 24 hour wait to to sink teeth into brand new breakfast item
articles.author: Neil Shaw
articles.summary: McDonald's launched a new Sausage Sandwich nationwide on September 10, priced at £1.99 as part of the Saver Menu. The sandwich includes a pork sausage patty, cheddar cheese, and a choice of ketchup or brown sauce. Additionally, McDonald's introduced Deal Drop reports, offering a McChicken Sandwich for £1.39 via the McDonald's App.

articles.title: Sir James Dyson on the pitfalls of stair-climbing robot vacs, what went wrong with Dyson Zone, pesky copycats and what keeps him up at night
articles.author: Rachael Sharpe
articles.summary: Dyson introduced the Spot+Scrub Ai robot vacuum that addresses the issue of stains that existing robots can't clear by repeatedly going over the area until the stain is removed. Dyson also developed stair-climbing robot vacuums, but decided not to launch them due to safety concerns.

articles.title: ‘Speed, not ideas, is the hardest challenge': James Dyson on innovation, AI
articles.author: Ayushmann Chawla
articles.summary: Dyson unveiled its next generation of air purifiers, vacuum cleaners, and fans at its flagship store in Berlin. The company focuses on creating smaller, lighter, and more efficient products. Dyson also incorporates artificial intelligence into its products to enhance effectiveness and ease of use.

articles.title: 7 Best Bath & Body Works Soaps Shoppers Are Buying Fast
articles.author: Leah Barrett
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works is introducing new hand soap scents, including Pumpkin Spice, Minty Eucalyptus, Coffee & Whiskey, and a "Spooky" scent inspired by Maleficent. The company is also launching a Spooky Hand Soap Dispenser.

articles.title: 7 Best Bath & Body Works Soaps Shoppers Are Buying Fast — Best Life
articles.author: Leah Barrett
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works has launched several new and seasonal hand soaps, including Maleficent Gentle & Clean Foaming Hand Soap, Farmhouse Pumpkin & Spice Gentle & Clean Foaming Hand Soap, Frosted Cranberry Cleansing Gel Hand Soap, Kitchen Lemon Gentle & Clean Foaming Hand Soap, Aromatherapy Eucalyptus Spearmint Gentle & Clean Foaming Hand Soap, and White Barn Coffee & Whiskey. Additionally, they introduced the Maleficent Raven Gentle & Clean Foaming Hand Soap Dispenser for the Halloween season.

articles.title: Google: The Search Engine That Changed The World
articles.summary: Google introduced Gmail in 2004, offering 1GB of storage. In 2005, Google Maps revolutionized navigation. Also, in 2008, Google launched the Android operating system after acquiring Android Inc. in 2005.

articles.title: Chinese smart devices accelerate global push with AI ecosystem edge
articles.author: People Daily
articles.summary: Xiaomi is expanding its overseas presence in countries like Germany, Japan, and South Korea, showcasing its flagship smartphones and a range of connected devices in newly opened Xiaomi Stores. The company's strategy focuses on AI empowerment and full-ecosystem synergy to drive global growth.

articles.title: Economic Watch: Chinese smart devices accelerate global push with AI ecosystem edge
articles.author: China.dot.org
articles.summary: Xiaomi is expanding its global presence beyond smartphones by introducing a full ecosystem of connected devices, including wearables, smart TVs, robot vacuums, and home appliances, in its overseas stores in countries like Germany, Japan, and South Korea. This expansion is driven by AI empowerment and full-ecosystem synergy.

articles.title: Make cleanup playtime exciting with the best toy vacuum
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: The Casdon Dyson Cord-Free Vacuum is a realistic toy vacuum with working suction and sounds. The Fisher-Price Laugh & Learn Light-Up Learning Vacuum offers educational benefits with sounds, songs, and phrases. The LeapFrog Pick Up and Count Vacuum includes 'dust' pieces and interactive games for kids.

articles.title: Punggol vending machines are serving up freshly cooked meals at S$1.99 till 14 Sept
articles.author: Tammi Tan
articles.summary: ChefGenie has launched its automated kitchen solution at Punggol Coast Mall, offering freshly cooked meals. The service uses AI-powered technology to prepare restaurant-quality meals from raw ingredients, with options including halal and non-halal dishes from brands like Warong Pak Sapari, Takagi Ramen and Eat Pizza. During the launch period, meals are offered at a promotional price of S$1.99.

articles.title: Gartner Says Worldwide GenAI Smartphone End-User Spending to Total $298 Billion by the End of 2025
articles.summary: Gartner projects worldwide end-user spending on generative AI (GenAI) smartphones to reach $298.2 billion by the end of 2025, representing 20% of total AI end-user spending. Mobile vendors are increasingly integrating on-device GenAI models and applications, with end-user spending expected to total $393.3 billion in 2026. Gartner expects that 100% of premium smartphones will feature GenAI capabilities by 2029.

articles.title: Here's how to score free laundry service in your area with Surf!
articles.author: Chau Morales
articles.summary: Surf introduced its Ultra Power Liquid, emphasizing its ability to simplify laundry and save time. The company organized the Grand Laba Day, distributing free samples of the product in communities across Luzon and partnering with laundromats to promote its use. Users reported that Surf Ultra Power Liquid sped up their laundry process and offered a pleasant scent.

articles.title: LG REDEFINES IN-VEHICLE EXPERIENCE WITH XBOX GAMING AND ZOOM MEETINGS PARTNERSHIPS
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: LG Electronics pioneers the software-defined vehicle era with the introduction of its webOS-based automotive content platform. This platform represents a new service offering from LG within the mobility technology sector.

articles.title: [Photo] LG Uffle "Experience subscribing to AI service."
articles.summary: LG U+ is operating a pop-up store to showcase and allow customers to experience "Unusual Gap," an AI service subscription product. The store will feature over 10 types of exclusive AI services.

articles.title: This Is Apple's New Crossbody Strap Accessory for iPhone
articles.author: 9to5Mac
articles.summary: Apple unveiled its new iPhone lineup at the 'Awe dropping' event. The launch included a variety of iPhone accessories.

articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: BrilliA Inc. expects its proprietary lingerie brand, DIANA, to generate additional revenue in Indonesia, Singapore, and other ASEAN countries. This expansion is anticipated to contribute to the company's growth in the coming quarters.

articles.title: BrilliA Reports on NYSE Bell Ringing on August 25th
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: BrilliA Inc. expects its proprietary lingerie brand, DIANA, to begin producing additional revenue in Indonesia, Singapore, and other ASEAN countries. This expansion is anticipated in the near future. The company also announced a production agreement with a manufacturer in Cambodia to enter the Canadian market.

articles.title: [TEST] 'I screamed into my phone & got FREE Heineken®!' Here's How You Can Get Yours Too
articles.author: Bryan Terng
articles.summary: Heineken has launched "Heineken AghPay," a promotional campaign that allows users to convert their frustration into Heineken vouchers or a complimentary pint by screaming into their phones or dedicated machines in participating bars.  Additionally, Heineken is hosting a Microbrewery exhibition that provides an immersive tour of the Heineken brewing process. The campaign encourages responsible drinking and is available for non-Muslims aged 21 and above.

articles.title: Shokz OpenDots One clip-on earbuds review
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Shokz launched their OpenDots One clip-on earbuds priced at £179, targeting the premium market. The earbuds feature a secure and comfortable fit, excellent sound quality with plenty of bass and crisp higher frequencies, and a 10-hour battery life, extendable to 40 hours with the wirelessly charging case. The Opendots also have touch controls which can be customized in the app.

articles.title: Lexus world premieres the new IS (Toyota Motor Corporation)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Lexus premiered the new IS model on September 9. The new model will be available in various markets starting in early 2026.

articles.title: Tineco Celebrates 9.9 with Promotional Prices Storewide and New S9 Artist Breeze
articles.author: Media Outreach
articles.summary: Tineco has launched a storewide promotion for 9.9, offering products from $99. The company also introduced the S9 Artist Breeze, which is an addition to the S9 lineup.

articles.title: Exosens launches its new 5G image intensifier tube, a game changer in terms of visual perception and performance in night vision
articles.summary: Exosens has launched its new 5G image intensifier tube, designed to provide sharper images with reduced noise, enhancing visual comfort and reducing visual fatigue for users, especially in low-light conditions. With over 5,000 tubes already ordered, the 5G is already a commercial success. This new technology aims to modernize equipment for European land forces and become the future standard for night vision within armed forces, solidifying Exosens' position as a global leader.

articles.title: 尼康Zr新机也正式现身_手机网易网
articles.author: 相机Beta
articles.summary: Nikon is releasing a new camera, the Zr. Its size is seemingly smaller, and it integrates features similar to RED, potentially based on the Z63 model.

articles.title: No extra cost, just extra care: Five service upgrades for Huawei users
articles.summary: Huawei launched the Huawei Service Upgrade Programme in 2025, offering customers a suite of five free premium after-sales services, including expert solutions, cleaning and refresh, diagnostics, system renewal, and round-trip shipping. The program is available across Asia-Pacific, Latin America, Europe, the Middle East & Africa, and Eurasia, and customers can book services through the My Huawei app, the Huawei Support website, or the support hotline.

articles.title: SAMBAZON® Opens First Manhattan Location in Greenwich Village
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: SAMBAZON is opening a new location in Manhattan's Greenwich Village on September 13, 2025. The grand opening will feature free Açaí bowls for the first 200 guests. The new store will offer SAMBAZON's signature Açaí bowls, smoothies, and savory snacks made with ethically sourced, organic ingredients.

articles.title: 37 Products You'll Kick Yourself For Not Buying Sooner
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Laneige launched Neo Blurring Powder that mattifies skin and provides a blurring effect. Gold Bond introduced a firming neck and chest cream containing salicylic acid, glycerin, and aloe. Veet released a sensitive hair removal gel formulated with aloe, providing longer-lasting results than shaving.

articles.title: Did you buy Google's Pixel 10?
articles.summary: Google released the Pixel 10 series in August, featuring the Pixel 10, 10 Pro, and 10 Pro XL models, which were launched last year. The Pixel 10 Pro Fold is scheduled for release in October. Reviews for these models have started to appear.

articles.title: Worried about Windows 10's death? Don't fret – Tiny11 is a lightweight version of Windows 11 that cuts bloatware and can run on older hardware
articles.author: Isaiah Williams
articles.summary: Ntdevlabs has released Tiny11 builder, a custom, lightweight version of Windows 11. This new product is designed for older or less powerful hardware and removes features like OneDrive, Office Hub, Edge, and Outlook. It is available via a script on GitHub.

articles.title: New Ecommerce Platform Classic Choice World Debuts with Luxury Brands and Vintage Treasures Under One ...
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Classic Choice World launched a new e-commerce platform. The platform combines vintage aesthetics with luxury brand selection, providing a novel shopping experience.

articles.title: nubia Air redefines slim style by integrating a 5000mAh battery within a revolutionary body as thin as 5.9mm
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: On September 5, 2025, nubia launched nubia Air, a new smartphone designed to address consumer desires for a slim design without compromising battery life. The global launch signifies nubia's response to young consumers' preferences for a balance between aesthetics and functionality in their smartphones.

articles.title: nubia Air redefines slim style by integrating a 5000mAh battery within a revolutionary body as thin as 5.9mm
articles.summary: ZTE's Nubia Air, featuring a 6.78-inch 1.5K AMOLED display and a 50MP AI Triple Rear Camera, will be available in Europe in September 2025. The smartphone boasts a 5,000mAh battery, up to 20GB Dynamic RAM, and IP68/IP69K water resistance, with prices starting from $279.

articles.title: Monster's $150 Earbuds Are Just $30 at Walmart, and They're Perfect for Working Out
articles.author: Cameron Cardwell
articles.summary: Monster Bluetooth Earbuds are available at Walmart for $30, a discount from their usual price of $150. These open-ear earbuds feature Pure Monster Sound, 32 hours of battery life with the charging case, and IPX5 water resistance, making them suitable for workouts.

articles.title: nubia Air redefines slim style by integrating a 5000mAh battery within a revolutionary body as thin as 5.9mm
articles.author: ZTE Corporation
articles.summary: nubia launched the nubia Air globally on September 5, 2025. The nubia Air is an ultra-slim smartphone featuring a 5.9mm thin body, a 6.78-inch 1.5K AMOLED display, a 5000mAh battery, and intelligent AI. This new device weighs 172 grams and targets young, style-conscious users.

articles.title: How to Build a Complete Multi-Domain AI Web Agent Using Notte and Gemini
articles.author: Mark Tech Post
articles.summary: Notte and Gemini enable the creation of a multi-domain AI web agent. This agent can be used for researching products, monitoring social media, and analyzing markets, suggesting a new AI service offering.

articles.title: VMO debuts The Cube with Mentos campaign
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Perfetti Van Melle's Mentos launched its new Mentos Cube gum range with a 'Mouth Off' campaign, utilizing VMO's new 4x4 metre experiential LED display, The Cube, in World Square, Sydney. The campaign features a 3D animation of the cube-shaped gum and is supported by sampling activations and amplification across VMO's retail networks.

articles.title: Polestar 5: A Gorgeous Electric Grand Tourer Poised to Challenge Porsche
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Polestar has launched the Polestar 5, an electric grand tourer available for order, with the base model priced at £89,500 and the 'Launch Edition' at £104,900. The Polestar 5 includes an 800-volt electrical architecture and offers up to 650 kW (884 hp) in the Performance version. The base model accelerates from 0 to 60 mph in 3.8 seconds and has a range of 416 miles, while the Performance model achieves 0-60 mph in 3.1 seconds with a range of 351 miles.

articles.title: Ultimum ignites Southeast market with brand launch
articles.author: Our Reporter
articles.summary: Ultimum Limited has launched its Razzl brand into Southeast and Southsouth markets in Nigeria. The trade launch included stakeholders and distributors, signaling the company's commitment to market expansion. Ultimum plans similar events in other cities to deepen connections and promote Razzl as the preferred carbonated soft drink.

articles.title: Mentos set to ‘Mouth Off' with 3D cube campaign at World Square
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: Val Morgan Outdoor (VMO) launched the first campaign on The Cube with Perfetti Van Melle's Mentos and Havas Media to promote Mentos' new cube gum range and 'Mouth Off' campaign. The campaign uses 3D animations and dynamic effects on the 4x4 metre LED installation at Sydney's World Square and amplified across VMO's path-to-purchase and large-format retail networks, as well as transit and social channels targeting Gen Z audiences.

articles.title: Price Chopper celebrates 10 years with Market 32 name, store concept
articles.author: Times Union
articles.summary: Price Chopper introduced the Market 32 brand ten years ago, offering a new shopping experience. The company is now celebrating the 10-year anniversary of this launch.

articles.title: 33 Useful Things To Treat Yourself To
articles.author: Danielle Healy
articles.summary: E.l.f. launched a sheer tint "Squeeze Me" lip balm infused with moisturizing hyaluronic acid. New "floating" air conduction headphones that provide compact convenience without sacrificing audio quality are available. There is also a snazzy two-slice touchscreen toaster to majorly upgrade your ancient one.

articles.title: Service consumption will drive future growth
articles.summary: Huawei has launched its latest tri-fold smartphone, attracting buyers to its stores in Shanghai. This launch contributes to the upgrading of China's consumption market, which is shifting towards service consumption while also seeing increased demand for quality goods.

articles.title: MR. OWL'S FRESH NEW LOOK
articles.author: The Saline Courier
articles.summary: Tootsie Roll Industries has refreshed its iconic "How Many Licks" TV spot. This update likely aims to revitalize the brand and maintain its relevance with a new generation of consumers by showcasing the product to consumers.

articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Renault debuted the sixth generation Clio, featuring a redesigned exterior and a hybrid powertrain. This marks an update to the company's existing Clio model.

articles.summary: Android devices are set to compete with Apple's upcoming products. This signals ongoing rivalry and potential releases of new mobile devices or features by both Android manufacturers and Apple.

articles.author: The Daily Dot
articles.summary: Team Cherry launched Hollow Knight: Silksong on September 4, 2025. The game's release resulted in shattered records and temporary disruption of Steam's services due to high demand.

articles.author: PV Magazine
articles.summary: Solarcleano, a Luxembourg-based company, has launched L1, a portable and semi-automatic cleaning system featuring 2.45 m wide brushes designed for single-person operation and large-scale projects. This latest product is specifically designed for cleaning solar panels.

articles.title: This major bank has a little-known 'dream fund' prize fund draw with £72,500 to be ...
articles.author: The Daily Mail
articles.summary: TSB launched a new 'dream fund' prize draw, offering five customers a chance to win £10,000. The draw is available to both new and existing TSB customers who deposit £5,000 in their current or savings account.

articles.title: 2027 Audi Concept C ushers in Audi 2.0 with radical clarity
articles.author: Fox31 Denver
articles.summary: Audi unveiled Concept C in Milan, positioning it as a design manifesto emphasizing minimalism. The company plans to launch an electric vehicle in 2026. Concept C is not just an idea, but a possible preview of future Audi design principles.

articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Apple is launching the iPhone. The event is happening today.

articles.summary: A popular make-up brand launched a new perfume designed for everyday use. The fragrance is described as being versatile like 'your favourite jeans or that perfect white shirt'.
